name: Luxury Collection 2023
description: Collect premium fashion NFTs from top luxury brands to unlock exclusive benefits

requirements.description: Own at least 4 NFTs from Prada or Gucci
Each NFT must have a minimum value of 100 units
NFTs must be created within the last year

reward: Exclusive access to upcoming fashion drops and virtual showroom experiences

name: Sustainable Fashion Pioneer
description: Support sustainable fashion by collecting eco-friendly certified luxury items

requirements.description: Own at least 4 NFTs from any luxury brand
Each NFT must have a minimum value of 100 units
NFTs must be created within the last year

reward: Participation in exclusive sustainability-focused fashion events and early access to limited edition collections
